text: Gopal Singh Rawat (died 22 September 2020) was an Officer on Special Duty to Uttarakhand Chief Minister Trivendra Singh Rawat.OSD to Uttarakhand CM dies of Covid-19 _ Dehradun News - Times of India (archived) He died on 22 September 2020 from COVID-19 in the hospital of All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Rishikesh. He had been hospitalized for nearly three weeks. == References == Category:Year of birth missing Category:Place of birth missing Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in India Category:Indian civil servants
title: Gopal Singh Rawat
